about_the_game:
The Dandara: Trials of Fear Edition Original Soundtrack by Thommaz Kauffmann features over one hour of ethereal and organic music created specifically for the exploration of the Salt's surreal world.

This edition contains the original soundtrack, as well as 20 fully remastered tracks of the original release, plus the new Trials of Fear original soundtrack, which focuses on the gloomy aesthetics that reverberates in all hidden places of the Salt.

Melancholic but also hopeful, the soundtrack tells the story of Dandara from a musical perspective: her lonely path through the Salt's imposing and mechanical music textures.

Composed, produced and mixed by Thommaz Kauffmann
Cover art by Luísa Almeida
